description:
There`s a new frog in town: Gororo.  He`s rough and tough and determined to take over the Hinata family`s home so they can use it as a base of operations.  Which involves first getting rid of the current residents!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giroro Uchyuu de Mottomo Kiken na Otoko / Keroro Ame Tokidoki Kiken na Otoko de Arimasu
Giroro voit rouge / Drôle de climat
ギロロ宇宙で最も危険な男 であります / ケロロ雨時々危険な男 であります
